content.detailedDescription:
Sunday morning at 4:30 am i woke up like very alert and could not go back to sleep.  at 5:35 my daughter came home very excited that she had seen a ufo.
i had her describe calmly and in detail what happened. she was with two friends driving home after watching movies all night at another fiends home in portland ore. patric was driving my daughter in the passenger seat, jessie in the back seat.  the car was approaching the intersection of interstate and killingsworth streets, going north on interstate. a extremely
bright light appeared on the drivers side about 4 ft. from the car it being  about 3 ft in diameter  and about 6 ft. in the air following along side of the car strobing intensely into the car , patric yelled out "what the f...   a car approaching from the east on killingsworth st. skidded to a stop.  my said daughter it flashed very rapidly for about 4 seconds then time slowed down.  there was no sound, she could not even hear the car motor running. they continued through the intersection, and became alert again, patric said "was that an angel or a ufo lets.... forget it".  he would not talk about what just happened and brought my daughter home.  it only takes 20 minutes to drive home so these kids are missing 40 minutes of time. the three of them are in their early twenties . they came home sober and clear. when my daughter was five years old she and her brother woke me one night and told me about a gray that came into the bedroom they shared and  stared at them a long time then dissolved into thin air.      for myself and my twin brother we have had many ufo experiences.
content.summary: Strobing white light-very close

content.detailedDescription: Facing north sitting on deck watching stars, witnessed with my husband and grandaughter a v- formation of 12 to 14 oval or egg shaped lights that were a dull milky orange color.Noticed it  while looking at the big dipper which was northwest of our position.Seemed like a flock of canadian geese in regards to formation of the lights. crossed a large section of the horizon in in 5 to 6 seconds. at the large end of the v formation 2 lights protruded off the end of the back of the formation on one side, and one light on the other side of the end of the formation.There was no sound at all. their trajectory was in a straight line with do deviation except it seemed to go hiher and higher until it was out of sight. elevation and size was not determined as there was no background to compare it with, except a few stars in the northern skies into canada. felt ominous and wierd. we are stargazers and witnessed a simular event 12 years ago: a v formation of white dull lights with less objects(5) that traveled much slower but was silent. this experience was bizarre as the object went over our house and returned traveling back to the same direction from when we first saw it.
content.summary: Arrowhead formation of milky orange lights heading noth east at high speed, silent

content.detailedDescription:
A friend and i were stopped at a light in marietta,
the windy ridge/powers ferry intersection.  silently we both
noticed green lights (circular in shape) dancing in the intersection
on the pavement.  my friend said, "do you see those lights" and
i nervously said, "yes, i do."  we watching many of them 
dancing back and forth and then the cylindrical lights became
kind of elongated as they moved toward the car and then 
disappeared.  to explain the shape further, they at first seemed
circular like if you were to shine a pen flashlight straight down 
on the pavement and then became elongated in our direction as if
a flashlight were tilted.  we both looked out the window of 
the car, but neither of us saw anything in the sky.  also,
it was relatively late on a sunday night and there were no other cars on 
the road at the time.
content.summary: Did not see anything in the sky at all.

content.detailedDescription:
I would have sent this in as soon as this happened but i had no idea mufon existed.  i am watching http://speedstream.Netro.Ca/netrostream113/npcc.Wmv and major george filer, iii stated this website's existance.

on or about in the early half of november in 2000, at approximate 10:30 p.M. (i remember seinfeld was playing on channel 11--my family member was watching it), i decided to go to the supermarket by foot.

one block north of jericho turnpike on 1st avenue between old steward and central avenue, as i was walking due east, i was actually praying to god and asked him to explain to me why there is so much suffering on earth, why does he allow us to stumble.  i looked straight up over my head into the sky.  it was night time and overcast with low clouds.  a break in the clouds occurred and i saw the stars in the late night sky.  i also saw a star brighter than venus traveling due east.  i thought "wow, a shooting star" but instantly realized it was traveling slower than a shooting star but much faster than a plane.  plus, it had no tail.  it was just a very bright white big dot.  after seeing it travel for two seconds in a straight line due east, it, without stopping, made a 90 degree turn and headed north without stopping, then clouds obscured my view.  i turned around to see if anyone else was around, but unfortunately i was alone.

i continued to walk towards the supermarket and wondered if it had anything to do with my prayer to god.  was it his answer?  i then processed what just happened and i concluded that because it was so bright, it must have been either so high that it could reflect sunlight or it was emitting it's own light.  also, due to the high speed 90 degree turn, that no human could survive that maneuver.  at all visible time this object traveled in straight directions, due east and due north.

i am including a map of where i was when i saw this object.

i remained calm during and after this experience.

this is the first time i'm reporting this.
content.summary: High speed 90 turn

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were out for a walk when a strange light caught our eye.  we saw a orange orb slowly going across the sky, below the clouds.  it was absolutely silent and moved in one direction.  after getting about halfway across the sky, it fizzled out and disappeared.  about 20 mins later, 2 more orbs appeared out of the same direction.  one seemed to follow the other one.  the first orb made it all of the way across the sky and out of sight, while the other seemed to fizzle out and disappear.  our whole family (6 people) witnessed the 2nd instance with us.  i found out that the clouds were at an altitude of 6000-7000 feet, so that gives a good idea at how low to the ground these objects were....They were definitely below the clouds.
content.summary: Orange orb/fireball

content.detailedDescription: This event happened outside of knoxville, tn. it was around the first week of march, '09. i had gone to bed around 1am. around 3:30 i was jolted awake by incredibly bright pulsating lights coming through the second story bedroom window. there was also a high-pitched whining/whirring sound that was almost deafening. this lasted maybe 2 minutes. it was very scary but i could not move. i realized that i was lying flat on my back with my arms beside me and all of the blankets had been pushed to the side of the bed. once the sound stopped i was able to move and ran to the window and looked out but saw nothing. i have no other recollections of the incident.
content.summary: Pulsating lights; knoxville, tn

content.detailedDescription:
Murrysville, pa - july 10, 2009 12:11 a.M. (23 miles east of pittsburgh)

4:45 minute hd video caught of an orange ufo that changed into a silent flying weird rotating triangle type ufo.

thought it was another sighting of the orange ufo, filmed 3 nights in a row, on july 7, 8, & 9th at 9:44, 10:00 & 10:23 pm respectively--like a pattern.

came back from farm field with 360 view on top of hill where i caught them last two nights.  just came in and went sat down in livingroom that has high wall of alpine-style glass facing south.  saw the moon, jupiter & noticed a second bright object orangey object higher to the left of them.  thought, "wow, it's back again!".  grabbed the camcorder and ran out onto the deck and started filming.  was still in nightshot with infinity zoom from last shot, tripod still in the car.  

what was different was that the orange ball of light started blinking on the left side, the color green.  thought, "what, is this a "lake horn style fake me out?" (planes that look like ufos when approaching an airport). there is no airport in this direction of travel and so i kept filming to see what could be making the orange color.  to my astonishment, more lights appeared in a somewhat faa pattern, but with 3 center bright white lights stacked like pyramid.  it seemed to be  rotating as it flew and examination of the video confirms this.  the green right side "navigation" light ended up on the opposite side by the time it crossed the valley in front of my house, circled to the nw to disappear behind my roof line.  the light patterns kept changing perhaps as a result of the tilting as it flew silently.  valley is bowl shaped and you can yodel down it and hear a deer poop.  no sound came from it. it wasn't traveling that fast to take 4:45 to travel about 3000 feet and i don't think a plane could fly upside down at that speed, in the dark, at midnight, over houses.

it must have circled back towards the east because a woman in duncansville, pa by altoona filmed it several minutes later 80 miles away.  she describes it as "spinning" and silent also.  her youtube channel name is nimitta1 and she's seeing and/or filming alot of the same stuff as me.  perhaps route 22 is the ufo corridor!  
hd video with blow up stills can be seen on my youtube channel:  seeingufospa 
video:  http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=rdpg257zhkk
content.summary: Murrysville:  orange ufo ball turns into weird rotating triangle ufo -silent flying

content.detailedDescription:
Brooksvile incident vol. 1 page 165 note script. this is per many years  of investigation's into this incident and related matters, including attempt's to get other entities to translate this script. recent attempts include former navy personnel and their partial translation and combined efforts at translations.
speculation's:
read from line no.1:
"i am"  varient of name or name's
two possibilities: 
                  one; 3 or 4 entities
                  two; one entity
description of entities and or thier point of origin,
description of part/direction of solar system, system's/sector, ( region of space ) and or number of planets.
line 1 partial;
signature block or partial descritption their of, of said matters.
line two:
next entity's name and point of origin
"i am". "i am from the area...."
description of solar system or systems/sector, ( region of space) more directions and directions of systems....             
line three;
more description of said matters
line four;
more description of said matters
line five;
more description and another possible name and description.
line six, ( two lines )
signature block.
photo pending
this was one of a few incidents involving this type/model ufo.
content.summary: Known as the brooksville incident, per ufo encyclopedia 2nd. ed. by jerome clark

content.detailedDescription:
This happened in 1959; i would have been about 5 years old. it wasn't just one event although i'm not sure of how many times this happened. i used to be afraid to go to bed at night because of what i called the wagon wheel and the owl people. this was in the monroe manor subdivision outside of laporte, indiana. 
 a number of times i saw what i called a 'wagon wheel' that never stopped turning. there was some sound to it; i seem to remember a kind of clacking noise. it would be easy to see it out of the open window. i remember being very afraid of it.
 along with that would be the 'owl' that would stand next to my dresser. i called him that because of his eyes, but i remember also thinking that he must be a little boy since he wasn't much bigger than i was. i don't recall being afraid of him in the beginning but later on i was. after that i always wanted to make sure there were no lights on in my room at night so i wouldn't be able to see him. my feeling was that the 'owl boy' was not good and was something to fear. at one time i saw a group of them and kept thinking that they were the 'wrong color'. other memories of this are patchy at best.
content.summary: Wheel shaped ufo; indiana, 1959

content.detailedDescription:
Approx 3:15pm while filling up my vehicle with gas, i looked to the north/north east and noticed 3 objects in the sky flying in a west/ south west direction. at first i thought they might be remote control airplanes or other small craft. but as i continued to observe, i noticed that they kept a tight formation. they changed direction a couple of times and they seemed to keep the same brightness no matter which direction they flied. i tried to capture in my cellphone video camera and pictures but nothing appears in the pictures and the video camera failed to record. as i contiued to observe (thinking my camera was recording) i watch as the three bright orbs followed each other making quick manuevers under a cloud formation. from my viewing distance they did look like seperate orbs but they flew in unison as one doing circles. they then flew into the cloud and disappeared.  i tried to debunk and rationalize what i was seeing but realized i was seeing what i've been watching the skies for years for.

i've attached 2 photos, maybe someone with better equipment may be able to see the 3 orbs.
content.summary: 3 orbs flying above orange park acres area

content.detailedDescription:
Paul hicks field investigator 10901 spirit lake iowa. i am entering an old report. form completed 2/21/1987. i worked with jean sorensen at bluffs run dog track. jean was on her way to work at the iowa school for the deaf in council bluffs, iowa. it was still dark. she noticed the object because it was so bright. at first she thought it must be something from offutt afb. she said it was "so real". it was hovering not directly above the droge house and it illuminated the house. (this house was built in 1936 and mrs droge murdered her husband in this house.) she stopped her car and looked at it for about 5 minutes. the object never moved. there were lighted windows or windows between lights, she wasn't sure. object: silver. 100' long, 25' thick. 100' from ground, 250' away. 45 degree elevation. 
"she went on to work and about 5 minutes later her co-worker arrived. they were the only ones in the kitchen. jean said she came in looking strange and she asked her "did something happen to you?" the woman answered "did you see what i saw too?" they talked about it. i never talked to the other woman as they were no longer friends and jean wouldn't give me any info. this report sent to ray boeche mufon 12/12/1988. jean lived in the old fort dodge house in council bluffs. she said it was haunted. doors and drawers would open and close by themselves. she would hear her name being called. i have 8 pages of the original report that i cannot include in the attachments. ph
content.summary: Object hovering over house. light from windows on rim illuminating house. didn't move. another witness observed.

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside to see why my labrador was barking and noticed that he was looking up at something.  he had been barking for about 10 minutes, which is not normal unless there is an animal in the yard. i saw a gigantic orange/yellow glowing sphere hovering about six blocks away at about 200-300 feet above the ground.  i just thought "that is weird," and kept watching it for about two minutes and trying to make my dog stop barking.  he was very agitated.  then it started moving in my direction very slowly and i got a little nervous, but couldn't move because i was so mesmerized by it.  as the object got closer i could see that there was some kind of structure to it that looked like a dark silvery color under the brightly glowing light. there was a weird static electricity feeling in the air and i felt that they were watching me and maybe probing my mind or something.  the light from the object did not shine on anything, which was very odd considering how close it was to the tops of the houses. i called to my wife but she didn't hear me.  

it moved right over my head and i was thinking "this is a ufo!" and i reached for my gun instinctively, but i had taken my holster off earlier. i still could not move away - i think i was watching it for about a minute or two, then watched it move on and away several blocks, then it just shot up at a 45-degree angle and it was gone in a second!  i was very shaken up by this and actually started shaking.  it was at that moment i knew that i had seen a real ufo and it was nothing from earth. i looked around to see if any of my neighbors were out and they weren't.  then i went inside the house to get a beer and noticed that it was 2:12 am.  that was too long - i was not outside that long and i don't know why the time was so much later.  at first i thought that whatever it was messed with the electricity in the house and caused the clocks to go haywire, but they were all the same time. i tried to get my wife up to talk to her about it but she was too tired. i went to sleep a few minutes later and slept in late this morning, then looked up the missouri mufon website and called them.  i have not even told my wife about this yet because i am afraid she'll think i'm losing my mind.  

i am in law enforcement and served in iraq as a sergeant - i have combat training and am a big guy. i don't scare easily, but this has me very upset.  i just had to tell someone about this experience - but i could never let anyone at work know about it or i could risk losing my job.    


note from field investigator:  i took this report by phone.  witness refused to make a report to mufon.Com on his own. he wants no further contact.  i told him to call back if anything else happened.
content.summary: Gigantic orange/yellow glowing sphere/craft hoovered over house

content.detailedDescription:
This event happened in the late summer, 1965. was outside of laporte, indiana, near the elks country club on johnson rd. i would have been 11 years old.
 it was late in the day and i was walking through the golf course about 2 blocks from home. i was on the hill near the parking lot when, looking down towards johnson road i saw something coming over the trees; it was maybe 30-40 feet above the tree tops. it was basically triangular in shape but rounded off at the corners. i saw no lights. the craft seemed to be a dark grey color. it was huge, moved very slowly and made no sound. as it came towards me i could see that the bottom wasn't smooth but had lines or something running across it.
 i remember as it came closer realizing it was going to go right over me; i was very scared and pushed myself into a large bush on the hill where i continued to watch it. as it got almost above me i could feel a deep vibration and hear a low hum. i hid my head after that, then, when i no longer felt the vibration i looked up and it was gone.
 i ran home and asked my mother, who was having coffee with the neighbor if she had seen anything in the sky. she said no but that it had gotten cloudy for a bit.
content.summary: Triangular ufo seen near laporte, indiana; 1965

content.detailedDescription: I was swimming with my children, looked up and noticed. i thought it was a cluster of helicopters as is common in hollywood around celebrity events. the objects were not moving, however, and made no sound. they seemed to be very high in the atmosphere. i was excited, gathered up my children and ran inside for the camera. i tried to take pictures but it was very difficult to photograph the sky. there was such little contrast marking the objects. a friend came over with her daughter to swim. i pointed them out to her and she saw them. she was excited and tried to call her husband to show him. he was not able to see them from his part of town. we watch them just hovering, not moving, not making sound. we had to watch the children swimming so at one point, when we looked away and looked back the objects had disappeared. they were difficult to focus on because of the glare of the sun. they seemed to be lit by the sun, not luminous themselves, like a star. they seemed to be spherical in shape and reflective. in person, their seemed to be 10-12 objects. as i reviewed the photo, i could only count 5. as i said, the photo was very poor. i will include an original photo, an enhanced, and an enhanced and cropped so you can find them. you can then go back to the original photo and do enhancements to reveal them for yourself.
content.summary: Constellation of reflective spheres in formation without sound or movement

content.detailedDescription:
I was smoking a cigarette with my girlfriend on our darkened porch, looking at the stars, when we saw what looked like at first a moving star.
my first thought was "oh there's one," since this is not uncommon in the past month, then it got brighter and i thought "did that just happen?" my girlfriend also saw all of this stated below. 

the were 12 different sightings in a 4 hour period.
1) saturn like object slightly dimmer, flying east to west in an erratic patter(like it was swerving invisible safety cones set in no discernable pattern) gradually got brighter to outshine anything else in sky. then got dimmer after about 15 seconds. lost sight to the west faded out.

2)6 more sightings of objects with same type of movement (like they were dodging invisible safety cones set in no discernable pattern) two were east to west, one was northeast to southeast, one was southeast to north, andtwo north to south, steady consistent glow, varying degrees of brightness, all lost to the horizon, and none flying in a straight lines.

3)sighting to the northeast hovering in air approx 5 miles away, very bright intense, almost looked like it was on fire with a white light. hovered in air for 30 seconds, then stared behind treeline, lost to treeline.

4)3 more lights moving low to horizon. two were north to south, one was east to west, all flying very low, and glowing white.

5)throughout all this there were intermittent flashes of intensely white light in the sky. in several different directions.

i would encourage anyone who saw this please post what you saw, as i'm sure someone else in southeast portland has seen things in the sky for the past month, that are not supposed to be there.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 10-11 bright objects in sky. 2 stood out, one gradually got brighter, one was hovering and intensely bright then took off.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was lounging in my pool and happen to be looking up at the sky. i noticed what i first thought was a helium balloon about "bird height". i took off my sunglasses to get a better look and noticed that it was actually "hovering" back and forth. it also appeared metallic and white. it glinted off the reflection of the sun, as if it were rotating. i also noticed that there was an outer ball surrounding it. the best way to describe the surrounding ball is, wavy-like the heat from the sun rising off of a hood of a car in the summer.  i yelled for my oldest child to go inside and grab my camera so i could film it. he brought out my camera while i kept my eye on it. as i started filming it, it moved (floated) higher near some clouds. i also noticed that there seemed to be a "glint" of orange or red a few times. i knew it wasn't a balloon, because of the way it moved and how high in the sky it went in a short amount of time. it then went into the clouds and seemed to go out of sight for good.  i have seen balloons flying over before and we also have a lot of planes and helicopters (due to a small airport being nearby)--but this was not like any of those.  this hovered for about ten minutes, then rose up much higher in the sky till it disappeared. i have no idea what it was, but it was unlike anything i've seen during a daytime sighting.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Round, white/metallic object with circular thermal ball around it.

content.detailedDescription:
My son and i was out with a campfire. it was twilight, the stars were just starting to appear. we were enjoying the night sky, listening for animals and watching the sky, enjoying the fire and the very nice night. we do this often. he has never seen a shooting star, but is always looking for them. he said dad there is one. he is 5 1/2 years old. i looked and saw a star. then i noticed it was moving. i started to think yea he finally saw one, when i began to realize this was still moving. it came in from "up" direction like a shooting star, but it was travailing much more slowly. it was along ways away and travailing extremely fast, but very slow compared to a shooting star! we had an extremely light scatted high attitude weather tonight. the clouds were extremely thin and way up. this thing was behind them and travailing towards us. it came from north to slightly northeast of us. it was heading at a direction nearly towards us, which would make it traveling "down" and south to slightly south east. it continued to get brighter and brighter. color was white like a star only brighter. it had a slight halo effect around it but i believe it was from the very thin very high altitude clouds it was flying thru.
it continued to head our way for probably close to a minute or a little more. i hollered at mom to come see this. me and the boy ran to the front of our place to watch it. it started to get dimmer. it was still coming down and getting dimmer; when it stopped coming down and made an instant 90* turn, to fly parallel with the earth. thats when i hollered at the boy: get mom, get mom, get your mom, get mom, damnit get your mom, get your mom, damnit i dont want to be the only one too see this thing, get your mom right now!
the object flew away from us in a north to northeast direction and continued to get dimmer and smaller until it dissapeared. by the time mom finally made it out, it was no longer visible to the naked eye. i was standing beside my truck when it went out. it was at that moment i remembered i had binoculars in my truck. i dug them out and continued to try and see this thing. when i looked where it dissappered i saw 4 to 6 (more or less),tiny but bright lights heading away from me.  1 to 2 of them dissapeared almost immediately. they were in a diamond shape formation (for lack of a better discription),and the area between them was real wavy looking like looking thru water.  2 more of them dissapeared within a few seconds. the other 3 turned west and continued to travel across the sky. the front one of them went out after maybe 30 more seconds. one of them was a little higher and quite aways ahead of the last one. the last one had a vapor trail coming out of it and was blinking. the last one looked different. i wondered if the last one was a fighter jet chasing the rest of them??? all of them dissapeared in a north to northwest and a distinct "up" direction. anyway the rest of them grossly outran the last one. i watched it dissapere as it neard the north horizon. it was very far north of me, traveling in a west to north west direction.
i spent the last 2 to 3 hours searching the skys and did not see anything out of the ordinary, except alot of airplane flying around tonight. the airplanes were clearly and unmistakeably different at any speed or distance from what i saw coming in from outer space!
wether this was an alien craft or some kind or an unknown anomaly, i could not tell you. i can tell for sure and absolutely for certain, what it was not. i have absolutely no clue what it was.
content.summary: Came in from outer space like a shooting star

content.detailedDescription:
Watering plants in my front yard. only a few stars visible as sun just going down. facing east, and noticed a bright light above and to the left of my position. bright like venus, moving steadily eastward. grabbed 10x80
binoculars sitting in my open garage. object looked the same thru objectives. approx size of a pea at arms length. bright bluish-white with an aura or halo as if illuminating moisture in the air. humidity typically 18-20% here. travelling at a steady rate north-north eastward. well north of the plane of the ecliptic to my right. not fading out as is typical with satellites. no sound. no deviation from straight path. took approx 3-5 minutes to disappear over the sierra nevada mountains east of fresno.
no contrail or exhaust. no flames. no pieces seperating. no sound. easily noticable to anyone looking up at the time.
content.summary: Bright light with halo. travelling north-north east. no sound.

content.detailedDescription: On july 4th, 2009 at approximately 2050 to 2055 my girlfriend and i were at salisbury beach in salisbury ma to watch the july 4th fireworks show that was due to begin at 2200 est. at the time of the sighting we had been at the beach for a few hours. the sun had set and it was dark but not completely dark. the sky was mostly clear with just a few wispy cirrus clouds and a full moon. we were looking at the night sky in the east southeast direction of the sky when we noticed a glowing fire red, oblong, cigar shaped object in the sky. we both noticed it at the same time. it was hard to miss.  at first we thought it may have been a glowing ember from fireworks but it lasted much longer then a firework would last and also there weren���t fireworks in our general vicinity. it was traveling at a very slow speed in more like a floating fashion. the first thing that i noticed right away was the fact that there was no flashing lights on the object, as all airplanes must have. we could not discern any audible sound from this object. at no time did this object make any erratic moves or deviate from its flight path. it seemed the center of the object had more of a concentrated light then the rest of it. we were able to witness the object glide through the night sky for about ten minutes or so. there were scattered families on the beach and we did not observe anyone else commenting on the object in the sky. when we first noticed the object we were both baffled by it, and tried to identify what it could be and neither of us could draw any conclusions. i have never witnessed an object flying in the sky that did not make a sound. i grew up in the flight path of a major airport in ny and was in the air force so i am very familiar with the sound of both commercial and military jets.  i was able to take three pictures of the object. two of the pictures i took depict the object as a red ball but the third picture more closely resembles what we actually witnessed. it was very hard to focus on it due to the minimal light at the time. after about ten minutes the object either disappeared from our line of site or just disappeared. the reason i am submitting this report was due to the fact that i read an article online with a video of the same one that we may have witnessed in the examiner.Com and felt compelled to tell my story.
content.summary: Witnessed a glowing red cylinder/cigar shaped object

content.detailedDescription: On july the 7th 2009. i experienced something that will haunt and excite me for the rest of my life. i was not the only one to sse what i saw and i definitely won't be the last. but i believe my side of the story is unique because i was one woman standing alone among men chasing something we till this cannot forget or explain. at 9 p.M. on july 7 2009 i sat in the living room of my boyfriend of over one year enjoying a movie, when he recieved a call from a close childhood. when he when outside to take the call he was urged by his friend to look up in the sky. there he saw something extrodinary a green orb-like object hovering in air a mere hundreds of feet up. he ran inside and coaxed me outside. i looked up and saw something i never imagined i would've seen my whole life. we watched the object in shock. then we realized in was moving. we quickly gabbed a digital camera and jumped in my boyfriend small vw bug. we drove to his friend's house anxiously. when we got out of the car the object was still in our site. we urged his two friends to get in the car but they didn't want to lose of it. at that time we hopped back. though i was very uneasy and unassure of the situation my boyfriend insisted we try to get as close to it as possible. we drove with the object in sight and stopped when we felt we were near. we got of the car it was at this moment we realized the green object was right above us. for once i am not going to put on the tough girl front i try to in life and tell the truth. there had been few occasions up to this point in which i had ever been so frightened. i grew more nervous by the second. i was so scared it was difficult for me to even look at the object. i only knew two things at this point this thing was definitely real and it was like nothing i had ever seen before in my life. i got in the car quickly and begged my boyfriend that we leave. after a few minutes he got in the car an headed back to his friends house. the four of us me, my boyfriend, and his friends got in the car and returned to the street where we had been directly under the object. we all jumped out of the car barely before it stopped moving. and then we saw we weren't the only ones. there in the middle of the street was a middle aged man. he had pulled his car over with his two small children and his wife. he was looking up at he object in pure amazement and confusion. it was at this time a woman and her children imerged fom the house we were parked in front. we later found out that she had heard her dogs baring and went outside to see what was happening. this is when everything started to happen. all at once we were all on the phone calling every close neighbor we could. soon of few of our friends began to arrive. most of them had excuses "its a plane or a helicopter." they were quickly silenced when the object began to move unlike any human-made machine we had ever seen before. it zig zagged erratically up and down, side to side at a rapid speed. i was completely amazed,excited and to be perfectly frank extremely scared. i began taking pictures. i took over a hundred pictures that night. and a young man who was there caught the strange object on video. but none of the photage could even slightly conpare to seing the object hovering in mid air. the people and families that had stopped to see what was going on grew tired and began to leave. we asked everyone there if they had a telescope. only on young man did but he lived far and refuse to go get it from his home. so we tried our best to keep a steady view of the object through a pair of binoculars. it was difficult since at this point my hands were a bit shaky, from a mixture of excitement in fear. but still we all could make out the same thing. a rice shaped, oval like , glowing green object hovering in the sky. at this point there were only few of us left three young men, and myself. four of the witnesses had left to retrieve the telescope. that when the object began to move again. not being to let go of what we were seeing we all jumped in the car and followed the object over to the next street. thats when another two cars stopped near us. five young men emerged from the cars and stared at the object amazed and skeptical. we shared our story with them and thats when the four young men arrived with the telescope. we tried but could not get the object into focus. it was at this moment that a police officer arrived he emerged from his car. here we were a dozen teenage boys and one girl camped outside a perfect strangers house with a telescope. you can imagine we assumed the worse. but we couldn't accept being force to leave. so though we knew he wouldn't believe us we pointed out the object to the officer. and to the suprise amd relief of everyone he saw it and he believed. this officer then stared in wonderment and looked through our pair of binoculars. searching his mind for any excuse he could feed us. but in the end he couldn't deny hat he had no explanation for what we all had seen. he quickly called in the report and left. a little after 12 a.M we were tired, hungry , and the object was nearly out of sight. so we all reluctantly decided to go home. i may never know exactly what i saw that night. but i know i will never forget it.
content.summary: A long oval shaped, upright green object moving eractically over boca raton.

content.detailedDescription:
Noticing a lightning storm to the north of pueblo, co. i set off for a good vantage point near the 4th street bridge near corona st.  the plan was to take long exposure shots of the lightning, only there was a cluster of lights over the city when the camera (nikon d80, w/sigma dg70-300mm) was finished recording the shot.  they were not visible to the naked eye.  on the 4th 30sec exposure of the same area the lights do not appear as they were in the first three seeming much further to the north of town, and not at all present in later exposures.  i didn't notice that the lights were present until later when i reviewed them when i was done. i tried to find them again in a second round of photos but the yielding nothing at all.  this may turn out to be some kind of optical illusion, but it is very interesting and the shots submitted are unaltered and i will leave the originals on the memory card for later analysis if necessary.

let me know what you think of them, thanks for your time.

p.S. 3rd photo in sequence upon request, 3 photo upload limit.
content.summary: 4 photographs of lights in the night sky during a lightning storm

content.detailedDescription: Morning.., no concept of time when camping, saw circle directly across the neighboring ridgeline, maybe 3 miles away... not sure of distance, before the words could come out of my mouth to indicate the existance of it to my significant other, ... it began to set like the sun behind the treetops. by the time i had finished saying, "xxxxx, look at that and tell me what you think, it was gone". only rational explanation was a high tech satelite dish that was in a submersable mode at the time. felt exposed to the occurence due to the visibility range and close proximity. closest campers were faced at a different angle around the mountain and three quarters of a mile from us.
content.summary: Round, gold, hovering above treeline

content.detailedDescription: Hello.First of all,i am an ordinary mother of two and wife in my early 30's who has taken an amazing photo that i'll cherish forever...My nephew and neice were having their graduation party at the pavillion of the lake where i took the photo. this lake(lake granger-willis creek park) is located about 20 miles south/southeast from my current physical address. my son and 3 other children had been begging me all day to take them down to the water so they could swim. i finally took them all down to the water when it became cooler that evening. just me, my son and the three others went down to the water, which was about 50 yards from the pavillion, down the bank that leads to a tiny(non-swimming) beach area. as they were playing in the water i decided to take a couple of pictures of them, while just sitting there in my lawn chair.The kids were about 10-12 feet out in the water from the bank. it was still pretty sunny and hot and the lake was very calm. in the picture you can see the kids are playing with and around a lot of logs and sticks, due to the low lake levels because of the hot weather and drought here in texas.I only took two pictures of the kids with my cell phone camera. i never heard nor saw anything while taking the pictures and as you can tell from the picture, the kids don't even notice what's behind them ! later that night i was looking through the pictures i had taken throughout the day and realized i caught an unidentified object over the water of the lake !!! i've held the picture for over a month now because i had no idea who to contact and who i could trust. i e-mailed the picture from my phone to my computer and saved it in my hard drive (personal copywright). as i zoomed the picture of the disk to a very large size on my computer, i noticed the disk seems to have large green and red lights, which are very bright to the right side of the disk.... please contact me asap for any further details you may have or need ...Thanks so much for taking your time to evaluate my photo!!! delia
content.summary: Large ufo caught in photo over lake in texas !!!

content.detailedDescription:
Murrysville, pa:  july 9, 2009
two sightings:
1.  10:23 p.M. - orange orb traveling from w to e in sky approx. at lower plane type altitude.  moved fairly fast, but did slow down, then speed up again.  appeared to streak at times.  constant glow, no pulsating like the july 7th sighting.  this is the 3rd nightly sighting in a row!  thought a plane behind it was following it at first--similar altitude, but it continued on it's more southernly path.  another plane passed it too. not the iss or another satellite, we checked n2yo.Com to see what was in the sky.
hd video footage of it with other sighting videos posted to youtube on my channel:  seeingufospa

uploading 3 blown up stills from video here(if it works).

2.  11:09 p.M. - "dot" high altitude, white/yellow in color, traveling w to e (or nw to ne to our position).  daughter shined laser at it and it responded each time by glowing bright!  didn't shoot & kill us, so i assume it because they're smart enough to determine that it's just a light, not a weapon.  very exciting to get a response!!!  shot video, but was too high altitude to show up on film.  we saw another high altitude one after, but the laser had no effect--same path almost, very small dot.
content.summary: Murrysville:  weird triangle ufo-looked like orange orb first!

content.detailedDescription: I was living in a small trailor with my husband and two small children. my oldest son who was three at the time was in bed with me .I always kept the bathroom light on and left the door open therefore the light would shine in at the foot of my bed and you could see in the room very well. on this night i couldnt fall asleep and was laying on my back.My son was sleeping beside me it was about 12:00 at night. i happened to look down to the foot of my bed and thought i was seeing things or my eyes were playing tricks on me.There was a small reptile like being with a very large head and hugh roundeyes staring at me and it looked very agressive. the eyes were not almond shaped but large and round. they looked like the eyes of an animal when light shines on them at night.I felt as though i was being held down against my will i could not move,speak or scream. i was terrified. i could not even call out to my husband it felt as though the force of gravity was holding me down on the bed. this thing moved in a strange way not as a human but like when the picture changes on tv.Extremely fast.It went from the foot of the bed to the side of the bed in about 2 seconds flat. finially i broke away from the bed and ran out of the room screaming for my husband there was no way that thing could of gotten out of the room yet it was gone.This incident happened to me back in 1975 and iv told this story many times over the years and to this day i still think about it and wonder what it was. however i am not obessed with this stuff. just thought id tell my story and im certain there are many more like mine out there    thanks   bonnie wright
content.summary: Alien

content.detailedDescription: On the 4th of july i was at my mother's house celebrating. we had just let off some fireworks and me and 3 other people were standing in her driveway. the street was full of people and we were not the only ones to see the object. as we were standing there, out of the corner of my eye i caught an object appear to the northeast just above the tree line. from where we were standing the object was approx. a 1/4 mile from us so it was probably 100-200ft. above the trees. at first we thought that it was a firework burning out and falling back to earth. after watching the object for a second we realized that it was holding a steady altitude and direction. the flight path was very controlled and proceeding from my right to left and lasted a minute or two. the object was a sphere that was bright orange color with a hint of red and was flickering slightly. the object seemed to slow for a seconds in its flight path never losing altitude and then curved off to the right heading directly north. we could see the object gaining altitude and speed as it went off into the distance until it disappeared. as you can imagine we were baffled. my mother lives in the flight path to the airport in town and planes fly over everyday but you can here and plainly see them. this object did not make a sound or have any familiar lights on it to signal it was an airplane. that same night about an hour before the sighting a helicopter even flew over at low altitude and we could distinctly hear and see it. the strange thing is the object returned about 10min. later in the same exact spot it appeared the first time i saw it. it held the same flight path that it did the first time and the object looked exactly the same, with no sound as well. the object slowed for a few seconds and then speeded up again to take off in the northern direction it had left the first time. both sightings were exactly the same only about 10 min. apart. we thought the first sighting was strange but when it came back and how it got back so fast from the direction it left was baffling to us. no airplane or helicopter i have ever seen around here has that kind of shape, color, or ability to fly like the object did. i would say at least 10 people saw the object both times it flew by and nobody could explain what it was and none of us had ever seen anything like it. we were all excited as well as confused by what we had seen that night. the object flew off to the north until it was out of view and we did'nt see it again. this is the first experience i have had like this with a unidentified object in the sky. to my knowledge there are no aircraft that travel the way this one did nor do any look like the object we saw that night. it is possible that it was some kind of debri burning out but the flight path, speed, and the fact that the object returned led me to believe that it was something else in the sky. i was not the only one to see the object and there are several people who saw the same thing i did and were as stunned as i was. i cannot explain what we saw but i do know that it is nothing i have ever seen in the sky before then.
content.summary: Spotted a orangish red sphere over the tree line that left and returned.

content.detailedDescription:
Was standing outside in my garden as usual with my mother. suddenly she pointed at the sky and asked me what the bright red orange thing up on the horizon was. it was emitting a radiating beam of light like a star or some similar object, hovering above buildings in the distance. it was like a bright orange fireball. 

it started moving from side to side above the buildings. it was close to the city's television tower and a big chimney from a coal-powered heat-providing station, so that the first thing my mother asked was whether it was some kind of tower identifying light. it moved from the left side to the right, stopping to hover slightly above each building, then continuing its motion. after it had gone to the right side it started moving backwards, then stopped and made a slight upward movement and then started moving extremely slowly. i ran around the house looking for a camera, and when i came back it was gone. the whole sighting lasted for no more than five minutes, although i have no idea for how long it was actually hovering there.

one rather strange thing that i might add is that immediately before i actually saw the ufo i felt an impulse to go downstairs to talk with my mother. it might be completely unconnected, but it just seems strange that one minute i was engaged in one kind of task and the next i felt i had to go into our garden. i usually feel really scared when i see something like that out of the blue in the sky, but when i saw the light i actually felt somehow relieved, and when i started writing this i had a feeling of real ease and happiness. these might be just my own emotions unconnected with ufo activity, but then again...
content.summary: Bright red orange gleaming ball

content.detailedDescription: Approximately 12:15 am my son spotted the large low flying glowing object coming from the chimney rocks area in hollidaysburg, pa. i video taped the entire event. i was slow low and magnificent, no noise at all from the craft. the most spectacular siting ever. it was flying east to west. i uploaded the video to youtube http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=c8zj3jy74tc
content.summary: Large glowing triangle object with incredible light object pattern

content.detailedDescription: Was at a friend's house doing fireworks.  they live in the middle of the city and around 9 or 9:15 my husband comes up to me and says "look over there in the sky" i looked up to the northwest and there they were.  two of them.  they looked like balls of orange and they were both going the same direction.  at first we thought they were airplanes, but then we could not see any other lights (blue or red blinking).  then a few minutes they just vanished.  my one friend said they were airplanes.  well then after we had done all of the fireworks and we were just letting the kids do sparklers another ball of orange showed up.  this was around 9:45.  and it was by itself.  i got a picture with my friends camera, but her camera is not really good.  it traveled the same way as the first two orange balls. traveling  due west to northwest. at first everyone was like "it has to be a hot air balloon" but i told everyone it was an ufo.
content.summary: Looked like a orange ball in the air above tree line.

content.detailedDescription: We had just finished shooting fireworks at a family gathering in worth missouri. we were sitting around talking when i noticed the event. it was a bright red dot moving slowly from north to south. my wife remembered that we had the camera in our car. so we got out the camera and were able to shoot a little video of it before we lost it i would say due to trees, there are several large trees in our little town. there were several witnesses to this event that night, i decided to report this after seeing the same sort of object shot from different locations around the country on july 4th 2009. i only wish i were able to get to the camera faster so there would have been more to show
content.summary: Bright red orb
